text.div:
HSPC ProviderPractitioner Privilege

A set of codes that describe the level of authorization given to a provider to practice medicine at an institution.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/practitioner-hspc-privilege defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
e6310141-5308-4062-a176-0a03197fb489 Full Privilege The provider is allowed to practice and admit
0a9a9b65-4f9f-42fa-ade8-0d2592bde220 No Privileges to practice or admit The provider is not allowed to practice or admit
77f1b390-a433-4708-ad3b-070e358868f4 Privileges Suspended The provider is not allowed to practice or admit at this time
5750552b-25d4-4eb8-86f9-8233756449f0 Practice Privileges Only (not allowed to admit) The provider is allowed to practice only, cannot admit patients
45fc874f-d787-43f2-a2aa-5954446b163d Temporary Privileges The provider is allowed to practice and admit for a limited time

name: HSPC ProviderPractitioner Privilege
description: A set of codes that describe the level of authorization given to a provider to practice medicine at an institution.

concept.definition: The provider is allowed to practice and admit

concept.display: No Privileges to practice or admit
concept.definition: The provider is not allowed to practice or admit
The provider is not allowed to practice or admit at this time

concept.display: Practice Privileges Only (not allowed to admit)
concept.definition: The provider is allowed to practice only, cannot admit patients
The provider is allowed to practice and admit for a limited time
